content: using chunky yarn for your crochet projects is always awesome the soft texture of the the chunky and bulky yarn is fun to work with these yarns are best to make soft and squishy crochet blankets scarves and pillows today am sharing the pattern for one row repeat basic textured chunky crochet scarf its the most simplest and easiest crochet scarf pattern to make often the most basic stitch patterns make amazing crochet projects this crochet scarf pattern is made only with single crochets the single crochets are made only in the back loops this gives the scarf the texture and volume its a one row repeat pattern the chunky yarn makes it a quick working project you can easily finish this scarf in an hours time materials used - chunky yarn 1 skein 10 mm crochet hook size - 7 / 30 inches - can be customized to any size crochet terms used - us crochet terms checkout the video tutorial here https //youtu be/wu9dgqjfow8
